title: Cocktails and caviar before my C-section | The Best Money I Ever Spent
description:
Writer Gray Chapman tells us why a dinner of oysters, caviar, and champagne the night before she gave birth was the best $298 she ever spent. 

Link to essay: https://www.vox.com/the-goods/22456529/best-money-birth-c-section-oysters-cocktail 

Enjoyed this episode? Rate Vox Quick Hits ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ and leave a review on Apple Podcasts.
 
Subscribe for free. Be the first to hear the next episode of Vox Quick Hits by subscribing in your favorite podcast app.

This episode was made by: 


- Editor: Alanna Okun (@alanna)

- Engineer: Paul Robert Mounsey
